Header.title: See the Eureka Springs that most folks miss
Header.paragraph: Get outside of town and see what more Eureka Springs has to offer.

About.paragraph: “Off the Beaten Path Excursions” is a veteran-owned outdoor adventure company located on a sprawling 94-acre wooded property in Eureka Springs, Arkansas. We offer guided UTV and Hiking Tours, a variety of unique experiences (Shooting Range, Beekeeping, Champion Tree), cabin rental, and more.
Why: Immerse yourself in Eureka Springs' natural beauty
94 private acres of pristine Ozarks, ready to be explored
Whether you're looking to have fun or just relax, we've got you covered.
Why2: Our property features its own natural spring and all tours include a visit.
Tour beautiful bluffs and rock formations
